translation.title: Translations
translation.subtitle: Manage AI-powered translations for your content
translation.sectionSubtitle: Translate your content to reach international visitors
translation.warningFinishContent: Finish preparing all your content first (project details + content items)
translation.warningFreeForPremium: Translations are FREE and unlimited for Premium subscribers
translation.warningQuality: Powered by Google Gemini for high-quality translations
translation.clickButtonToStart: Click "Manage Translations" to translate your content
translation.outdatedTooltip: Content has changed since translation - update recommended
translation.outdatedBoxTooltip: Translations marked as outdated when original content is edited. Re-translate to keep them current.

dialog.title: Translate Content
dialog.limitReached: Language limit reached. Delete an existing translation to add a new one.
dialog.limitReachedDetail: Upgrade to Premium for unlimited languages.
dialog.creditActionDescription: Translate content to {count} selected language(s). Each language translation costs 1 credit and covers all project details and content items.
dialog.manageModeDescription: Select translations to delete. This action cannot be undone.
dialog.manageModeWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Deleting translations is permanent and cannot be undone.
dialog.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete the {language} translation? This action cannot be undone.
dialog.confirmTranslateMessage: You are about to translate to {count} language(s). This is included with your Premium subscription. Continue?
dialog.reviewBeforeConfirm: Review what will be translated before confirming
dialog.aiNotice: ‚ú® Using GPT-4.1-nano for high-quality, context-aware translation of museum and cultural content.
dialog.largeContentWarning: ‚ö†Ô∏è Your project has substantial content. Translation may take up to 60 seconds.
dialog.jobCreatedDetail: Your translation is processing in the background. Check the Jobs panel below for real-time progress.
dialog.backgroundInfo: ‚ú® Translations run in the background. You can safely close this browser or navigate away!
dialog.parallelExecutionMessage: All {count} languages are being translated simultaneously for faster completion!
dialog.availableMessage: Your content is now available in these languages for all visitors!
dialog.failureMessage: Failed to translate {count} language(s). Please try again.

delete.title: Delete Translation
delete.confirm: Are you sure you want to delete the {language} translation? This action cannot be undone.
delete.confirmMultiple: Are you sure you want to delete {count} translations ({languages})? This action cannot be undone.
delete.successMessage: The translation has been removed successfully.

success.title: Translation Successful
success.message: Your content has been translated successfully!

jobs.title: Translation Jobs

empty.title: No translation jobs yet
empty.description: Translation jobs will appear here when you start translating your content

jobs.retry_success_detail: The translation job has been queued for retry
jobs.cancel_confirm: Are you sure you want to cancel this translation job? Reserved credits will be refunded.
jobs.cancel_success_detail: Translation job cancelled and credits refunded
